definition: to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

sentences.english: The police arrested one principal criminal and two accomplices.
sentences.chinese: 警方一举拘捕了一名主犯和两名同案犯。

sentences.english: The accomplice providing testimony in criminal litigation has special role.
sentences.chinese: 在刑事诉讼活动中，提供证言的同案犯具有特殊地位。

sentences.english: Tony was found to be an accomplice in the crime.
sentences.chinese: 人们发觉托尼是该案的同案犯。

sentences.english: Tony was base to be an accomplice in the crime.
sentences.chinese: 人们发现托尼是该案的同案犯。

sentences.english: Those who assist are responsible art and part .
sentences.chinese: 帮助犯罪的人是同案犯。

definition: to bring to justice/to file away (a document)
to retract testimony/to withdraw a confession
(of a bird, fish etc) to be caught in a net/(of a tennis ball) to hit the net/(of a criminal) to be captured
to make an appearance in court
to repeatedly commit an offense/repeat offender/habitual criminal/recidivist/recidivism
